title: New LG Nexus phone with 3D camera rumoured to be in the works | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Nexus 5]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Besides this LG smartphone, it’s also been heavily rumoured that[Huawei](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/huawei-nexus-leak-renews-hope-for-google-s-next-smartphone) will provide a direct phablet follow-up to the[Nexus 6](https://www.trustedreviews.com/nexus-6-review).
